### yum_cron

== Class: yum_cron: See README.md for documentation

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `yum_cron` class.

##### `ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `enable`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `download_updates`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `apply_updates`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### `debug_level`

Data type: `Pattern[/^(?:-)?[0-9]$/]`



Default value: $yum_cron::params::debug_level

##### `randomwait`

Data type: `Pattern[/^[0-9]+$/]`



Default value: $yum_cron::params::randomwait

##### `mailto`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'root'

##### `systemname`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::fqdn

##### `days_of_week`

Data type: `Pattern[/^[0-6]+$/]`



Default value: '0123456'

##### `cleanday`

Data type: `Pattern[/^[0-6]$/]`



Default value: '0'

##### `update_cmd`

Data type: `Yum_cron::Update_cmd`



Default value: 'default'

##### `update_messages`

Data type: `Enum['yes','no']`



Default value: 'yes'

##### `email_host`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'localhost'

##### `extra_configs`

Data type: `Hash`



Default value: {}

##### `yum_autoupdate_ensure`

Data type: `Enum['undef', 'UNSET', 'absent', 'disabled']`



Default value: 'disabled'

##### `package_ensure`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### `package_name`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $yum_cron::params::package_name

##### `service_name`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $yum_cron::params::service_name

##### `service_ensure`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### `service_enable`

Data type: `Optional[Boolean]`



Default value: `undef`

##### `service_hasstatus`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: $yum_cron::params::service_hasstatus

##### `service_hasrestart`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: $yum_cron::params::service_hasrestart

##### `config_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: $yum_cron::params::config_path

## Resource types

### yum_cron_config

Section/setting name to manage from yum-cron.conf

#### Properties

The following properties are available in the `yum_cron_config` type.

##### `ensure`

Valid values: present, absent

The basic property that the resource should be in.

Default value: present

##### `value`

The value of the setting to be defined.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `yum_cron_config` type.

##### `name`

namevar

Section/setting name to manage from yum-cron.conf
